extendedInfo.description: The Android app designed with the Direct Sales Consultant in Mind. Impress each and every guest with a quick and intuitive checkout process. myConsultant will make it easier for you to focus on what really matters; your customers, hostesses and recruits.  Streamline your sales with the myCalc feature. No need for an extra Calculator to add up each item, we've taken care of that for you. Calculates Shipping, Tax, Discounts and Commission.  Try it out for two weeks before you decide to buy.Get accurate sales tax rates in real time with myTaxRate. Simply enter any US address or select your current location. myTaxRate will then seek out the correct tax rate and determine whether or not shipping should also be taxed. It will even insert the tax numbers back into myCalc for you, automatically. This feature is built into myCalc and is available to buy with a subscription. myMileage is a feature that will help you keep track of your tax deductible vehicle mileage and expenses. Simply enter in your odometer reading when you start your trip and again when you end.  Try it out for two weeks before you decide to buy.myConsultant is dedicated to making sure you always have your data available. All of your logs will be automatically backed-up and synced between each device that is logged in to your myConsultant account.FEATURESâ¢ Calculate customer orders with ease.â¢ Discount just one items or multiple line items.â¢ Total up taxable and non-taxable items all in the same order.â¢ Set the shipping, tax and commission only once and it is saved until you need to change it.â¢ New myTaxRate feature automagically find sales tax rates for you.â¢ Track your vehicle mileage and expenses.â¢ Mileage logs are instantly backed up and sync'd across your devices with myConsultant installed.â¢ Customize the look of the app multiple backgrounds to choose from.Additional In-App Purchase Features:â¢ myTaxRateâ¢ ThemesWe are always developing new features to make the life of a direct sales consultant easier. Like us at http://www.facebook.com/MyConsultantApp and follow us at http://twitter.com/#!/MyConsultantApp for up-to-date progress.

reviews.title: Been using this app for a 2 years...
reviews.comment: It\'s no longer Free at all tho. I\'m not complaining about having to pay for something being I understand this is an amazing app and you worked hard to make it. Im making it a 1 star cuz you should instead charge One final price for the entire app not $3-$4 for each individual part. I already supported you by buying the Vehicle part so cmon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.comment: This app saves me so much time when closing out my home parties. What a relief! And it shows itemized tax and shipping which you can also turn off if it doesn\'t apply. Very much worth the $4.
reviews.author: LeeAnn DelGrande

reviews.title: You want $$ for this?!?
reviews.comment: My husband wrote me a better program using KingSoft Office. Works on my Nexus and allows me to enter all customers subtotal and it figures all the rest. MyConsultant is several programs sold separately and is only a calculator \"worksheet\". You can\'t\' even save shows for reference or tax purposes. Really??
reviews.author: Beth Marie Davanzo

reviews.title: False advertising
reviews.comment: Why advertise this as free when it really only is a free trial?!?!?   I know it used to be free but sucks that you still advertise it as free when it really isn\'t.  Uninstalling just based on the false advertisement trick.
reviews.author: Kai B

reviews.title: Pay Again
reviews.comment: I recently upgraded to an iPhone from the Droid.  I have paid for this app already do not want to pay again.  I\'m still with the same company.  Love the app don\'t want to pay again
reviews.author: Alice Burruss

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app love It
reviews.author: Sharon Martorana

reviews.title: NOT FREE
reviews.comment: Very disappointed this app isn\'t free at all it is a free trial and then you have to pay separately for both functions. One of them is more then 5.00.... This is insane to me. I didn\'t even try the trial as I\'m super bummed it says free but isn\'t at all.
reviews.author: Laura Steenhagen

reviews.title: Like the last version
reviews.comment: I liked the other version better, it was easier ti use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hate the new update.
reviews.comment: Hate the new update.  It keeps frozening up.  :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app for my direct consultant business I just wish you could charge one small fee for all features instead of seperate fees for each feature.
reviews.author: Tracy Greenamyer

reviews.title: Does everything
reviews.comment: Love this app.
reviews.author: montressa johnson

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This app makes my job as a Thirty-One consultant so much easier!
reviews.author: Judy Stokely

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This app is great and I always recommend it. I wish there was a subtotal tracker for the parties.
reviews.author: Tiffaney Johnson

reviews.comment: Extremely useful!!
reviews.author: robyn rychlec

reviews.title: My consultant
reviews.comment: Great program

reviews.title: BEST APP EVER CREATED! !!!!!
reviews.comment: Fits amazing for my thirty one parties I loveeeee this app.

reviews.comment: Really like this app.!!!!!

reviews.comment: Great app!!

reviews.comment: Amazing

reviews.title: Fabulous app!!
reviews.comment: The app makes checking out a breeze so I can focus on my customers rather than my calculator! Thank you!
